member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.XBeeAdapter
member.summary: A XBeeAdapter module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.XBeeAdapter.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.XBeeAdapter.Configure
member.summary: Initializes the serial port with the parameters 115200 baud, 8N1, with no flow control.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.XBeeAdapter.Configure(System.Int32,Gadgeteer.SocketInterfaces.SerialParity,Gadgeteer.SocketInterfaces.SerialStopBits,System.Int32,Gadgeteer.SocketInterfaces.HardwareFlowControl)
member.summary: Initializes the serial port with the given parameters.
member.param: The number of data bits to use.
